content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)
- Multiple Burner Inserters at positions (40.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5), and (41.5, -77.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -49.5), and (-9.5, -49.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)
- Multiple Burner Inserters at positions (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -46.5), and (-14.5, -45.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from chests
- Ensure that the chest you are trying to extract from contains the items you are attempting to move. Verify the chest's inventory before extraction attempts.

### Errors when transferring iron ore to furnaces
- Make sure the furnaces have the necessary ingredients before attempting to transfer materials. Check that the furnaces are not full or lacking fuel.

### Errors when moving items from mining drill drop positions
- Verify that the chests at the drop positions are not full and contain the expected resources. Ensure the chests are correctly positioned and accessible.
